sentence.Network_en: It is the eighth - largest satellite and the largest irregularly - shaped satellite of the 48 named Saturnian moons.

sentence.Network_en: Later lie is conveyed in both a Saturnian Scout and a Saturnian mother ship.
sentence.Network_cn: 稍后被带到一艘土星侦察机和母船上.
